_xform_tuple(tup)¶
static change_basis(csSource, csTarget)¶

Changes the plane basis of an object.

Parameters:
  • csSource (Plane) – Plane source of the object.
  • csTarget (Plane) – Target plane of the object.
Result :

Object with new Plane basis.
Return type:

Geometry

Warning

This method currently relies on access to the Rhinocommon Kernel. It will not work in other contexts.

static mirror(plane='world_xy')¶

Produces mirror transform. Can pass in “world_xy”, “world_yz”, or “world_xz”. Or, pass in an arbitrary cs (produces mirror about XYplane of CS).

Parameters:plane (Plane) – Plane to mirror the object with. Defaults to world XY plane.
Result :Mirrored object.
Return type:Geometry

Warning

When mirroring about an arbitrary plane, this method currently relies on access to the Rhinocommon Kernel. It will not work in other contexts.

Todo

Re-implement this method without using the Rhinocommon Kernel.

static rotation(**kargs)¶

Rotates an object around by a center and a rotation angle OR by a center, an axis and a rotation angle.

Parameters:**kargs (Point, Vec, float) – Function that accepts multiple parameters to be passed. Parameters include center and axis of rotation and a rotation angle.
Result :Rotated object.
Return type:Geometry

Warning

This method currently relies on access to the Rhinocommon Kernel. It will not work in other contexts.

static scale(factor, origin=None)¶

Scales an object by a given factor.

Parameters:factor (float) – Factor to scale by.
Result :Scaled object.
Return type:Geometry
strip_translation()¶
static translation(vec)¶

Translates an object by a given Vector.

Parameters:vec (Vec) – Vector to apply a translation.
Result :Translates an object.
Return type:Geometry
